forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness. High 13C. Winds NW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy. High 56F. Winds NW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness. Occasional rain showers after midnight. Low 8C. Winds WNW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy this evening with showers after midnight. Low 47F. Winds WNW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, becoming a steady rain later in the day. High 13C. Winds SW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, becoming a steady rain later in the day. High near 55F. Winds SW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the evening will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low 6C. Winds W at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, becoming a steady rain late. Low 43F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Becoming partly cloudy after some morning light rain. High 9C. Winds WNW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Light rain early. Breaks of sun in the afternoon. High 49F. Winds WNW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the evening. Increasing clouds with periods of showers after midnight. Low around 5C. Winds W at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the evening. Increasing clouds with periods of showers after midnight. Low around 40F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with mostly cloudy conditions later in the day. High 12C. Winds W at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with mostly cloudy conditions later in the day. High 53F. Winds W at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy during the evening followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low near 5C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies in the evening, then becoming cloudy overnight. Low 41F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness. High near 15C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness. High 58F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear to partly cloudy. Low 6C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low 42F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sun and a few passing clouds. High 17C. Winds NNW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few passing clouds, otherwise generally sunny. High 63F. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mostly clear sky. Low 8C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly clear. Low 46F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Except for a few afternoon clouds, mainly sunny. High 18C. Winds NW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Except for a few afternoon clouds, mainly sunny. High 64F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies in the evening, then becoming cloudy overnight. Low 9C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will become overcast later during the night. Low 48F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly to mostly cloudy. High 16C. Winds NW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 61F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy early with increasing clouds overnight. Low 9C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy early with increasing clouds overnight. Low 48F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable clouds early. Some decrease in clouds later in the day. High around 15C. Winds W at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High 59F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness. Low 8C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy. Low 46F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds early, otherwise mostly sunny. High 14C. Winds W at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sun and a few passing clouds. High 58F. Winds W at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Increasing clouds with showers arriving sometime after midnight. Low 8C. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy in the evening then periods of showers after midnight. Low 46F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.
